alert.note: Alert for Humphreys (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:00PM CDT until July 26 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL HUMPHREYS COUNTY... At 400 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Waverly, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waverly, Camden, New Johnsonville, McEwen and Hurricane Mills. This includes Interstate 40 near mile marker 147. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
